children.description:
I attempted to find similar shows featuring the title 'Squid Game', but there was an error in the response. Nonetheless, one show that I have information about is "Circle" (2015). 

Here are some details:
- **Title:** Circle
- **Synopsis:** When a group of strangers is seized and awaits execution, they face the impossible challenge of choosing the one person among them who is worthy of being spared.
- **Release Year:** 2015
- **Is Playable on Netflix:** Yes, available under certain conditions.
- **Format Quality:** HD

Since the data has shown an error halfway through a possible array of similar titles, it's likely there may not be able to gather more shows at this point.

Now, I will finalize this search and provide this being the succinct answer pertaining to recommendations based on 'Squid Game'.

{"final_answer":"As a fan of 'Squid Game', one similar show I recommend is \"Circle\" (2015). Its synopsis features a gripping subplot: a group of strangers facing execution, having to choose who among them deserves to be spared. The content is playable, and it is presented in HD. Unfortunately, due to technical issues, no additional similar titles could be provided at this moment.","return_type":"give_answer"}

2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
